active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs between flexible wildcard redirect URI matching (for usability) and strict exact matching (for security). Use real-world examples from breaches like the 2018 Facebook OAuth flaw to argue which should be the default in modern AS implementations.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
